SageTVPlugin.Name: Audio Stream Toggle
SageTVPlugin.Description:
Allows switching audio streams during video playback by pressing on a button on your remote.
For switching audio streams you'll also need to assign the "DVD Change Audio" command to a remote button or keyboard shortcut, either withing SageTV mappings or with your remote control software.
SageTVPlugin.Author: LM Gestion - StephaneM
